documentation.text: @dev Admin who decide the outcome of the game
@notice trcks the amount of bets
@notice array the hold all bets
@notice track addresses of all players
@notice track if the game is paid
@notice tracks the id of the players bets
@notice  tracks amount of back bets available to match : Selection => Odds => => stake amount
@notice  tracks amount of lay bets available to match : Selection => Odds => => stake amount
@notice tracks the Bet id of the backBets : Selection => Odds =>  stake => uint [id] | uint backBetId = backBetsId[_selection][_odds][backId][map_stake]
@notice tracks the Bet id of the layBets : Selection => Odds =>  stake => uint [id]  | uint layBetId = backBetsId[_selection][_odds][backId][map_stake]
@notice  track Id of first back bet available in the backBetsId[selection][odds][stake],  Selection => Odds=> stake  => Id   uint backId = firstIndexOfBackBet[_selection][_odds][map_stake];
@notice  track Id of first lay bet available in the layBetsId[selection][odds][stake],  Selection => Odds=> stake  => Id   uint layId = firstIndexOfBackBet[_selection][_odds][map_stake];
@notice tracks the payout of the player for each outcome
@notice tracks the amount of bets the player placed
@dev Check if the selection of the bet is correct
@dev check if the game is over
@dev check if game is still open
@dev Check if bet is unmatched -- Delete it
@dev check of odds are valid : we take _odds >100 then real odds is _odds /100 e.g 350 correspond to 3.5 odds

 @return The bet with the corresponding Id
@dev internal function that updates players balances when the game is finished, called when admin changes the game status
FALLBACK FUNCTIONS

devdoc.author: Baraa Elalami
devdoc.details: Order matching algorithm is basic allowing users to bet only one of the 4 amounts : 0.001 ETH, 0.01 ETH, 0.1 ETH, 1 ETH

params.teams: string describing the Game/Bet e.g Real Madrid vs Inter Milan

params._odds: must be > 100 then real odds is _odds /100 e.g 350 correspond to 3.5 odds
params._stake: Amount to bet (0 = 0.001 ETH, 1 = 0.01 ETH, 2 = 0.1 ETH, 3 = 1 ETH)

returns._0: number of back bets available for particular parameters
The bet with the corresponding Id

params._odds: must be > 100 then real odds is _odds /100 e.g 350 correspond to 3.5 odds
params._stake: Amount to bet (0 = 0.001 ETH, 1 = 0.01 ETH, 2 = 0.1 ETH, 3 = 1 ETH)

returns._0: number of lay bets available for particular parameters

getPayout(address,uint8).details: returns current player current payout for the selection

params._betNumber: the bet number _betNumber placed by the player

returns._0: The bet placed by the player
string of the teams/object of the game

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._odds: must be > 100 then real odds is _odds /100 e.g 350 correspond to 3.5 odds

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

admin.details: Admin who decide the outcome of the game

withdraw(uint256).notice: withdraw function, substract amount from user balance and send the amount
